description.en: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

title.en: I Can't Do That With My Former Student

altTitles.ja: でっかくなった生徒に求婚される話

altTitles.ja-ro: Dekkaku Natta Seito ni Kyuukonsareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 教子くんとはデキません

altTitles.en: My Student Grew Huge and Proposed to Me

altTitles.vi: Cậu học trò nay đã “lớn” và cầu hôn tôi

description.en:
A teacher finds herself getting a marriage proposal from her former student, who has had a significant growth-spurt since they last met.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_71416/status/1702677638756872490)

altTitles.ja: 魔王の人事

description.en: Igel sama the demon who soon will become the greatest member of the Demon King Army's Four Heavenly Kings! Except that on the day she thought she would finally be promoted she instead get transferred to the Demon Resources Department which seems to be the subject of lots of suspicious and scary rumors…

altTitles.ja: 今日からCITY HUNTER

description.en:
A forty-year-old single woman, obsessed with City Hunter manga, is hit by a train only to find herself in the world of her favorite manga. Big fan of Ryou Saeba since her teenage years, she will do all she can to live a love story with him.

---
Official Release:
- French release by Ki-oon (2019)
- Indonesian release by Akasha (2020)
- Italian release by Panini Comics (2019)
description.id:
Kaori Aoyama adalah seorang karyawati yang masih lajang di usia 40 tahun. Sejak remaja, pria idamannya adalah Ryo Saeba. Suatu hari, Kaori tertabrak kereta yang sedang melaju, namun saat tersadar, Kaori mendapati dirinya kembali ke sosoknya di masa SMA, dan hidup di alam komik “City Hunter” yang sangat disukainya.

Tak ada seorang pun yang bisa dimintai pertolongan oleh Kaori, dan tanpa sadar kakinya melangkah menuju papan pengumuman di Shinjuku. Harapan terakhirnya hanyalah huruf-huruf “XYZ”, kode untuk menghubungi City Hunter.

Di dunia City Hunter, Kaori memulai kehidupannya yang kedua!

(Sumber: Gramedia; sinopsis resmi)

altTitles.ja: エンジェル・ハート
エンジェル・ハート 1stシーズン

description.en:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics
description.ja: 台湾の黒社会組織の殺人兵器として養成された少女グラス・ハート。彼女は自殺を図るが、シティーハンターのパートナー槇村香の心臓を移植され一命をとりとめる。蘇ったグラス・ハートは組織を抜け出し、香の記憶に導かれるように新宿・リョウの元へ。やがて二人は香の心臓という絆で、再会をはたすのだが……!?
description.es-la: Una joven asesina taiwanesa con el nombre clave de "Corazón de Cristal" se suicidó saltando desde un edificio, y su corazón fue atravesado por una valla metálica. Milagrosamente, su vida se salvó gracias a un trasplante de corazón. Durante su recuperación comenzó a experimentar extraños sueños, que la llevaron a Japón en busca del donante de su corazón, que resulta ser Kaori Makimura, antigua compañera de City Hunter.

title.en: A Gal Who Isn't Kind to Otaku

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しくないギャル

altTitles.es-la: Una chica que no es para nada amable con los otakus

altTitles.en: Survival in Another World with My Mistress!

altTitles.ja-ro: Craft Game no Nouryoku de Isekai Kouryaku!!

altTitles.en: Different World Survival to go with the Master

altTitles.ru: Захватить другой мир с силой майнкрафта!
Захватить другой мир с силой ремесленных игр!

altTitles.ja: ご主人様とゆく異世界サバイバル！

altTitles.zh: 跟主人一起在异世界生存!

altTitles.zh-hk: 跟主人一起在異世界生存！

altTitles.ja: ご主人様とゆく異世界サバイバル! THE COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Goshujin-sama to Yuku Isekai Survival! THE COMIC

description.en:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world!  

――This is a light for life in a different world.  When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf…?!  
  
Start different world capture with different races and sub-races!  

---

- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)
description.es:
Supervivencia en el otro mundo con mi maestro  
¿¡Kousuke se encontró en un mundo completamente diferente!?  
De pie allí, con el desierto al este y un bosque a su izquierda, decidió hacer un buen uso de la ocurrencia y pone a prueba su conocimiento, donde encuentra esta increíble habilidad de creación, ¡al igual que los juegos de su mundo original!
description.ja:
気が付けば、そこは異世界だった!?目の前には荒野と背後には森が広がる大地に立っていたコースケ。

培った知識から森でサバイバルをしていたところ、元の世界でプレイしていたサバイバルゲームのように道具を作れるクラフト能力を手に入れていたことに気が付いた。

——これで異世界生活にも光明が。と思っていたところ、いきなり美人ダークエルフに襲われて……!?

異種族・亜人種たちとゆく異世界攻略スタート!!

---

- [Official LN (JP)](https://gcnovels.jp/goshujin/)  
- [Original WN (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3742ey/)
description.ru: Косукэ оказался в совершенно ином мире. Стоя там посреди дикой природы в густом лесу, он решил использовать это перемещение с умом и проверить свои знания выживания! Там он находит эту удивительную возможность крафта, точно такую же, как и в игре из его изначального мира!

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 3-bu 「Ryouchi ni Hon o Hirogeyou!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 3 「Let's Spread the Book to the Territory!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第三部 「領地に本を広げよう！」
本好きの下剋上 第三部

description.en: Following a disastrous encounter with a noble, Myne finally resolves to say goodbye to her family and friends in the lower city, changing her name to “Rozemyne” and beginning her new life as the adopted daughter of Ehrenfest’s archduke. However, her days as an archnoble in noble society are brutal, as she is put through rigorous etiquette and magic training on top of her duties as High Bishop and forewoman. It all proves too much for a weak little seven-year-old girl… Or it would have, had the High Priest not offered her the keys to the temple’s book room as a reward. If she could get her hands on those, she’d be able to read all sorts of precious books! Her name may have changed, but Rozemyne’s passion for books remains the same as she charges into a whole new world! The detailed setting expands as the printing industry grows in size. Here begins Part 3 of this biblio-fantasy for book lovers everywhere!

altTitles.en: Bowblade Swordsman: Descendants of the Bowblade
Archer Sword God: Descendants of the Archer

description.en: Eulji So Moon has aged well and is now a grandfather. He orders his mischievous grandson to go on a joyful trip to Zhongyuan! To save the fallen Namgung family clan and help them spread their wings once more, Eulji Ho’s journey starts now!!

altTitles.ja: 音戯の譜～CHRONICLE～

description.en:
In order to obtain the "ending" that will make all their wishes come true, the songwriters decide to fight with the power of their music.

What awaits them is either hope or――。

altTitles.ja: 恋愛代行

description.en: A half-Swedish, half-Japanese girl who seems to have everything except experience with men is using a date coaching app to get used to flirting. However the guy she hits it off with actually uses the same app with a different coach!
description.id:
Renai Daikou (Love Agency) – Agen Cinta
Akasaka Aka x Nishizawa 5mm
Akasaka Aka, yang telah membuat sejarah dalam sejarah komedi romantis dengan “Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen”, kembali dengan komedi romantis baru! Tim baru ini bekerja sama dengan Nishizawa 5mm, seorang pendatang baru yang sedang menjadi topik hangat di dunia manga online! Ini adalah awal dari “komedi
description.ru:
Девушка со шведскими и японскими корнями, у которой, кажется, есть всё, кроме опыта общения противоположным полом, использует приложение для обучения свиданиям, чтобы научиться флиртовать.
Однако парень, с которым у нее завязываются отношения, использует то же приложение с другим тренером!
description.uk:
Ака Акасака, автор "Каґуя-сама хоче, щоб він зізнався їй. Війна сердець та розумів геніїв" та "Дитя улюбленця", презентує свій новий витвір!

У Марі Марії Вінтер-Нанасе, наполовину шведки, наполовину японки, є все, про що можна мріяти. Дівчина виросла в заможній родині закордоном, має багато подруг і вродливу зовнішність. Однак є в ній один недолік: вона не вміє розмовляти з хлопцями!

Узявши в бібліотеці книгу про кохання, у ній вона знайшла підозрілу рекламу. Там йшлося про Агентство Кохання, що надає профі в коханні, який упорається з вашим особистим життям за вас. Після того, як дівчина відсканувала код, з'являється агентка, на ім'я Кон, та обіцяє допомогти Марі зійтися з її коханим. Однак хлопець, що припав їй до душі, Секі Масая, не такий уже й невинний і також користується послугами агентства, щоб почати зустрічатися з нею. Як складеться доля цієї пари?
description.vi: Tác phẩm của Akasaka Aka (tác giả của Oshi no Ko và Kaguya-sama) và Nishizawa 5mm. Một cô gái mang trong mình dòng máu Thụy Điển và Nhật Bản cực kỳ ưu tú nhưng cô ấy lại không có kinh nghiệm với đàn ông. Cô ấy quyết định sử dụng một ứng dụng dịch vụ tình yêu để chinh phục chàng trai ấy. Tuy nhiên, anh chàng mà cô ấy nhắm đến cũng đang sử dụng ứng dụng đó để chinh phục cô!
description.pt-br: Uma garota meio sueca/meio japonesa que parece ter tudo, exceto experiência com homens, está usando um aplicativo de coaching para encontros para se acostumar a flertar. No entanto, o cara com quem ela se dá bem na verdade usa o mesmo aplicativo com um treinador diferente!

altTitles.ja: 真夏のスピカ
怪異さんと俺

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/222807)

**Notes:**
- The Pixiv series does not contain all of the chapters and combines some. Do not follow the chapter numbering on Pixiv. Instead, enable Japanese chapters on MangaDex to see the proper chapter order and links to all of the raw chapters.
- This series uses characters the author used in illustrations beforehand.
description.ja: 俺くんと怪異さんのお話。

title.en: Yuusha-sama, Sakuya mo Otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.ja: 勇者様、昨夜もお楽しみでしたね。

altTitles.ja-ro: Yusha-sama, sakuya mo otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.en: Hero-Sama, I Hope You Had Fun Last Night.
Hero Last Night Was Pumped Wasn’t It?

description.en:
"I did it again...!"

The Hero who can't seem to set out on his journey!!

The protagonist, who was reincarnated into another world, becomes a hero and receives the task of defeating the Demon King. To repay the world that accepted him , he decides to set out on a journey... However, he can't seem to leave the first village, as he is constantly tempted by charming heroines such as the female priestess, his childhood friend who is a magician, and so on!

Thus, the birth of the "I did it again...!" type hero!

On the planet Eruthyll planet, humans obtained unique crystal veins called Dubriostal, based on which they developed brilliant magic tech.

Feeling blessed by Dubriostal, people start to worship and deify Dubriostal, thus resulting in the emergence of Crystalis Conflux. Steeped in Crystalis Conflux's propaganda, people discriminate against those who cannot resonate with the Dubriostal, branding them as Castaway and claiming their souls are incomplete. Crystalis Conflux secretly devised an evil plan; only Castaways can see through their lies. To fight against the Crystalis Conflux and save the world, Castaways formed their resistance group - Gopher Troupe.

This manhua elaborates on the founding of Gopher Troupe and Castaways' glorious path of struggle.

A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢の執行者―異世界執事は仰せのままに―
魔王令嬢の執行者

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou Reijou no Shikousha: Isekai Shitsuji wa Ouse no Mama ni

altTitles.en: The Executioner of the Demon King's Daughter
The Executioner of the Demon King's Daughter: The Otherworldly Butler Does as He Pleases

description.en:
From now on, you will become the butler of the Demon King’s Castle and live for me!

Lute, a young boy who was summoned to another world, but was abandoned due to his incompetence. The one who took his hand was the Demon King’s only daughter, Lurunoa. That encounter turns everything upside down. Three demon princesses with great hidden powers and secrets. When the mysteries of the continent are revealed, the boy becomes the world’s trump card!!

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.es-la: No te burles de mi, Nagatoro

altTitles.ja: イジらないで、長瀞さん

altTitles.th: ยัยตัวแสบแอบน่ารัก นางาโทโระ

altTitles.ar: لا تلعبي معي يا آنسة ناغاتورو

altTitles.en: Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro!

altTitles.pl: Nie drocz się ze mną, Nagatoro!

description.en:
Naoto Hachiouji —our spineless— MC (Known also as "Senpai") is a second-year high school student and a loner who spends his afternoons at the Arts Club room. He attracts the attention of one of his schoolmates, a sadistic freshman girl named Nagatoro. However, in between the bullying and teasing, something else begins to blossom.

A lovey-dovey(…?) story between a shy nerd and an S-Dere (Sadistic Tsundere) begins.

---

**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10042/episode/313808) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/dont-toy-with-me-miss-nagatoro/)
description.es:
Naoto Hachioji está en segundo de bachillerato, es un chico tan tímido e introvertido como buen dibujante. Un día, mientras busca un sitio donde sentarse a dibujar en la biblioteca, se le caen las páginas del manga que hacía, justo al lado de un grupo de chicas que, al verlas, se ríen de él en su cara y se van… excepto una estudiante de primero, Hayase Nagatoro, que básicamente empieza a darle caña hasta hacerlo llorar.

Desde entonces, Nagatoro y consecuentemente sus amigas, no van a parar de rayar a su “senpai” y molestarlo de todas las maneras posibles… Pero hay tres cosas a tener en cuenta: Nagatoro es especialmente tocanarices cuando están a solas, se molesta bastante si sus amigas se pasan con él, y en definitiva lo que ella busca es que su senpai salga de su burbuja autoimpuesta para que se divierta y conozca un poco el mundo que lo rodea… y quizás algo más…
description.ja: 憎たらしいけど愛おしい。苦しいのに傍にいたい。あなたの中の何かが目覚める、“Sデレ少女”の物語。
description.pl:
Naoto Hachiouji to nieśmiały chłopak, którego mało co przeraża tak, jak wredne dziewczyny. Nic więc dziwnego, że jego największym szkolnym koszmarem zostaje Nagatoro – koleżanka z niższego roku, która obrała go sobie za cel, regularnie serwując mu atrakcje z pogranicza wojskowej fali i końskich zalotów. Choć wydawać by się mogło, że szkolne życie chłopaka na zawsze pozostanie pasmem nieszczęść, nieoczekiwanie relacja tych dwojga zaczyna zmierzać w niespodziewanym kierunku…

(źródło: Studio JG)
description.ru: Нагаторо - переведённая ученица в старшей школе, которой нравится дразнить своего семпая. Но он всё стерпит. И пусть ему придётся пройти через все виды издевательств - он всё простит, потому что влюблён.
description.es-la: A la estudiante de preparatoria Hayase Nagatoro le encanta pasar su tiempo libre haciendo una cosa, ¡y eso es molestar a su Senpai! Después de que Nagatoro y sus amigos se topan con los dibujos del aspirante a artista, disfrutan molestando sin piedad al tímido Senpai. Nagatoro decide continuar con su cruel juego y lo visita a diario para poder obligar a Senpai a hacer lo que le interese en ese momento, especialmente si eso lo hace sentir incómodo. Ligeramente interesado por Nagatoro y algo temeroso de ella, Senpai está constantemente involucrado en sus payasadas mientras sus intereses, pasatiempos, apariencia e incluso personalidad se usan en su contra mientras ella se entretiene a sus expensas. A medida que pasa el tiempo, Senpai se da cuenta de que no le desagrada la presencia de Nagatoro, y los dos desarrollan una amistad incómoda mientras uno soporta pacientemente las payasadas del otro.
description.pt-br: Nagatoro é uma menina de primeiro ano na escola que adora fazer bullying com seu Senpai. Mas ele aceita isso, mesmo depois de ter passado por todos os tipos de situações humilhantes e embaraçosas, porque ele está apaixonado por ela.

title.en: Kono Hi, "Itsuwari no Yuusha" de Aru Ore wa "Shin no Yuusha" de Aru Kare wo Party kara Tsuihou shita

altTitles.ja: この日、『偽りの勇者』である俺は『真の勇者』である彼をパーティから追放した

altTitles.en: On This Day, I, the “False Hero”, Expelled Him, the “True Hero”, From the Party.

description.en:
Foyle, bestowed with the job of the “False Hero,” followed his role and expelled his best friend from the party, who was supposed to be defeated by the awakened “True Hero.” But at death’s door, Foyle is saved by Iris, an elf girl who is the only one that knows his true self, even as a false hero.

Acknowledged by her as “My Hero,” Foyle remembers his aspiration to save people like a hero and begins to desire to do so in the shadows. The “False Hero” who has lost everything becomes the “Hero of Shadows” and decides to embark on a new adventure!

altTitles.en: Goblin Slayer! Side Story: Year One

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝：イヤーワン

altTitles.zh-hk: 哥布林殺手外傳：第一年

description.en: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.
description.pl:
Prequel ujawniający przeszłość Goblin Slayer'a i wydarzenia, które doprowadziły go do zostania poszukiwaczem przygód, któremu przyświeca wyłącznie jeden cel: eksterminacja wszystkich goblinów. ~M  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentosakaeda)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.ganganonline.com/contents/goblinyo/)  
- [Official LN (EN)](https://yenpress.com/series-search/?series=yen346-goblin-slayer-side-story-year-one-light-novel)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma série de prequel que revela o passado de Goblin Slayer e os eventos que o levaram a se tornar um aventureiro com o único propósito de exterminar todos os goblins do mundo.
description.ru: События манги перенесут нас на 5 лет назад, в то время, когда Убийца Гоблинов только закончил свои тренировки и расстался с мастером. Манга поведает нам о том, чем занимался Убийца Гоблинов все эти 5 лет до встречи с Жрицей.

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

altTitles.ja: DEAD Tube ~デッドチューブ~

altTitles.zh: 学園殺人ゲーム Dead Tube

description.en: Distributing thrilling videos in secret! A school game that puts life and death on the line!
description.kk: Мектеп оқушылары киноклубта не түсіреді? Күнделікті өмірдің бөлшектері, әуесқой қорқынышты фильмдер... бұның бәрі зеріктіріп жібереді... бірақ бұл жолы емес! Басты кейіпкер Томохиро Мачиге, киноклуб операторы, мектептегі қыз бірнеше күнге оны түсіруді ұсынады. Ол ерекше ынталы емес болсада, бірақ ол да бас тартпайды. Егер жігіт бұл оның өміріндегі ең қызықты және қорқынышты фильм болатынын білгенде...
description.ru: Что могут снимать школьники в клубе любителей кино? Зарисовки из повседневности, любительские фильмы ужасов… скука полная… но только не в этот раз! Главному герою Томохиро Мачии, оператору киноклуба, одна девушка из школы предлагает поснимать её несколько дней. Он особо не горит желанием, но и не отказывается. Если бы парень только знал, что это будет самый захватывающий и будоражащий фильм в его жизни…

altTitles.ja: 私たちは繁殖している

description.en: Award-winning series by author and essayist Uchida Shungicu.  Starting in 1993 and still ongoing, this is a frank, sex-positive look at pregnancy, childbirth, child rearing, and single motherhood, notable for tackling such issues directly at a time when such treatments were rare. The series is tagged as Erotica because it has sex in it, but if you're looking for an erotic manga per se, you'll probably want to look elsewhere.

altTitles.th: วัยมันส์จอมป่วนก๊วนนักพากย์ !

altTitles.ja: 声優かっ!

description.en:
Kino Hime is a 15 year-old girl who just started her first year in a high school for voice actors (Seiyuu) called Hiiragi Academy. She dreams of becoming the voice of the main character in one of the most popular series in Japan, "Magic Fighter Lovely Blazers". The academy is the number one school which allows students to make their voice acting debuts and also includes other departments such as general education, sports, music, acting, and art.  
  
Of course this Academy is full of celebrities, too. Two of Hime's upperclassmen are none other than the two rising idols of the group "Idol Unit AQUA".  
  
But Hime's dream is hard to fulfill. Her voice is not really suitable for a voice actress and her new classmate Kudou Senri doesn't waste time in pointing that out. Will Hime prove everybody, especially Senri, what she is capable of despite the first appearance?
description.pt-br:
Kino Hime é uma menina de 15 anos que acabou de começar seu primeiro ano em uma escola para dubladores (Seiyuu) chamada Hiiragi Academy. Ela sonha em se tornar a voz do personagem principal de uma das séries mais populares no Japão, "Magic Fighter Lovely Blazers". A academia é a escola número um, que permite aos estudantes fazerem a sua estreia na dublagem, e também inclui mais departamentos: esportes, música, atuação, e arte.

É claro que esta Academia é cheia de celebridades, também. Dois dos colegas de Hime não são outros senão os dois crescentes ídolos do grupo "Idol Unit Aqua".

Mas o sonho de Hime é difícil de se realizar. Sua voz não é realmente adequada para uma dubladora e seu novo colega de classe Kudou Senri não perde tempo em apontar isso. Hime vai provar que todos, especialmente Senri, o que ela é capaz de fazer, apesar da primeira aparição?

description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

altTitles.ja: 金色のガッシュ！！ 2

description.en:
The sequel to Konjiki no Gash!!, aka Zatch Bell.

Once the battle to decide the king of the demon world, in which 100 demon children fought against each other, had come to an end… the king of the demon world was crowned, and the demon world lived out the rest of its days in peace.

Or at least, that was how it was supposed to be.

Now, a shocking fact about the current state of the demon world comes to light. And in the depths of their despair, three demon children decide to risk it all for one last chance at survival.
description.it: Dopo la battaglia per decidere il re del mondo dei demoni, in cui 100 bambini demoni si sono combattuti tra loro... Fu deciso il re del mondo dei demoni e arrivarono giorni di pace... o almeno così si supponeva! Fatti scioccanti vengono rivelati sull'attuale mondo dei demoni. Al limite della disperazione, tre bambini demone fanno una scommessa!
description.pt-br: Uma vez terminada a batalha para decidir o Rei do mundo demoníaco, na qual 100 mamodos lutaram uns contra os outros… o Rei do mundo demoníaco foi coroado, e o mundo demoníaco viveu o resto de seus dias em paz.

title.en: Toshiue Elite Onna Kishi ga Boku no Mae de dake Kawaii

altTitles.es-la: La Caballero de Élite Mayor es Tierna Solo Conmigo

altTitles.en: My Elite Senior Dame Knight Only Acts Cute to Me
Older elite knight is cute only in front of me

altTitles.ja: 年上エリート女騎士が僕の前でだけ可愛い

altTitles.zh-hk: 年上的精英女騎士只在我面前表現得可愛

description.en:
Haru is a 16-year-old recruit of the "Black Hawk" 4th Cavalry Unit of the Knights' Regiment under the command of Captain Karen, a profoundly beautiful and fierce 29-year-old swordswoman, who, unbeknownst to all the unit except Haru, is a pure maiden with exactly zilch experience with men. Being privy to this delightful side of her, Haru secretly henpecks her and teases her lovingly, which turns her into a flustered and heavily-armed tomato. Watch as he slowly inches his way into her heart as he dodges her longsword!  

- Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/228090)

title.en: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier

altTitles.ja: ふしぎな猫のまち メルティア

description.en:
This is "Meltier," a town of cats. Moko, who has no memory of her past, ends up helping out at a coffee shop in town. There, she meets many unique and fun kittens and friends! A little bit mysterious and extraordinarily happy. A heartwarming fairy tale fantasy of everyday life!

---
Note: Has an original song sung by the author herself called はじめまして、世界！
Yilin bumps into the tomboy Rouxi, sparking an interest between each other that slowly blooms.
description.pt-br: Yilin esbarra na tomboy Rouxi, despertando um interesse entre elas que floresce lentamente.

altTitles.ja: 誰がための瀧田くん

description.es-la: Número especial original de Big Comic, Número de mayo de 2024 del mismo autor de "Jigoku ni Ochite yo, Onii-chan"

altTitles.ja: Rabu Rabo
Renai Lab
ラブラボ
恋愛ラボ

description.en:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!

title.en: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Retorno Como O Membro Mais Jovem

description.en: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
description.id: Do Seohan, yang gagal dalam idol survival show terkenal “Stardust Project”, selalu dibayang-bayangi oleh mimpi masa lalunya. Tak pernah meraih kesuksesan, Seohan hanya bisa bekerja sambilan untuk melewati hari-harinya. Namun, akibat sebuah kejadian yang menimpanya, tiba-tiba ia terbangun dan kembali ke 8 tahun lalu, tepat sebelum “Stardust Project” dimulai! Jiwanya 8 tahun lebih tua dari kontestan lainnya, tapi sekarang ia yang termuda di antara mereka. Apakah kali ini Seohan akan berhasil debut sebagai idol?
description.ko:
"25살…그거 아이돌은 못하는 나이잖아요."
유명 서바이벌 아이돌 오디션 '스타더스트 프로젝트'에서 탈락했던 도서한.
꿈에 미련은 못버리고 현실과 타협한 채 알바를 전전하는데…눈을 떠보니 8년 전으로 돌아왔다.
그것도 '스타더스트 프로젝트'를 시작하기 직전으로!
막내가 된 (영혼만은) 최고 연장자, 이번에는 오디션에 합격해 아이돌 멤버가 될 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Do Seohan, que fracassou no famoso programa de sobrevivência de idols "Stardust Project", é sempre assombrado por seus sonhos do passado. Sem nunca ter alcançado o sucesso, Seohan só consegue trabalhar em empregos de meio período para passar seus dias. No entanto, devido a um incidente que lhe aconteceu, ele acordou de repente e voltou a 8 anos atrás, logo antes do início do "Stardust Project"! Sua alma é 8 anos mais velha que a dos outros participantes, mas agora ele é o mais jovem entre eles. Será que Seohan conseguirá debutar como idol desta vez?

description.en:
Xia Yuxin's presence at school never fails to draw attention. She has a mature beauty about her, always poised, and exuding confidence in class. Being admired so much by her classmates, one would think she's a well-respected senior but in truth, it might be because she's a repeat student. Xia Yuxin has more to her elegant facade.


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative official English](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/Lala/5c0a4df8d5626e75ff1f2d11)
description.pt-br:
Xia Yu Xun é uma estudante que por ter faltado em uma prova, teve que repetir um ano. Para todos os seus colegas de classe que são um ano menor que ela, Xia Yu Xun é uma Xue Jie (senpai, veterana) genial, alta, decidida, muito bela e muito “cool”. Claro que ela não pensa assim, adoraria ser mais baixa pois assim conseguiria usar roupas mais bonitas. Sua obsessão é tanta que desenha suas próprias criações, com intenção de algum dia surgir alguém com o “estilo” dos seus sonhos. Na escola acaba encontrando uma pessoa adequada para isso, mas fazer amizade com ela vai ser um pouco difícil…


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative official English](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5c0a4df8d5626e75ff1f2d11)

altTitles.ja: 俺の娘はドラゴン！

altTitles.zh: 女儿的超能力是把我变帅！

description.en: Jihoon was leading a draining life due to his demanding professor, when one day, his daughter fell out of thin air! Thanks to Chaerin, who was as smart and pretty as an elf, things started to look up for him. His skin started to get better, his eyesight and intelligence improved, and he even got taller and more handsome. This was all according to his daughter Chaerin's plans! Jihoon, who used to be an ordinary science and engineering university student, became a researcher leading the Fourth Industrial Revolution, AI!

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

title.en: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Moto Kanodatta

altTitles.es-la: La hija de mi madrastra es mi ex-novia.

altTitles.ru: Дочь моей мачехи - моя бывшая девушка

altTitles.ja: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

altTitles.en: My Stepmom's Daughter was My EX-Girlfriend

altTitles.pt-br: A Filha da minha Madrasta era minha ex-Namorada.

description.en:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited… and ended up breaking up on graduation.  
  
And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.  
  
“Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder brother.” “Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder sister.”  
  
The children of the partner of their parent’s remarriage was their ex-lover!?  
  
The former couple, mindful of their parent’s feelings, decided on a ‘sibling rule’ where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but—  
  
When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together… along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?  

---

- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsurekano)
description.ja: まだお互いに、好き同士。そんな元カップルが――親の再婚できょうだいに!?　第3回カクヨムWeb小説コンテスト大賞受賞の人気ノベルをコミカライズ！ 一つ屋根の下で繰り広げられる、ひたすらに甘くて焦れったい悶絶ラブコメ！
description.ru:
Эта история о парне и девушке, которые влюбились друг в друга ещё в средней школе. Тем не менее, со временем их любовь превратилась во взаимное раздражение, что привело к их расставанию после окончания школы…  
Но кто бы мог подумать, что судьбы Иридо Мизуто и Айя Юмэ пересекутся вновь при самых неожиданных для них обстоятельствах… Теперь они вынуждены жить под одной крышей, изображая для своих родителей сводного брата и сестру.   
Но оставаясь наедине и предаваясь воспоминаниям о прошлом… Смогут ли они сдержаться и не поддаться своему соблазну?!

title.en: Houkago wa Kenka Saikyou no Gyaru ni Tsurekomareru Seikatsu Kanojo-tachi ni Sukarete, Boku mo Saikyou ni!?

altTitles.en: The Story of Being Taught How to Fight by a Delinquent Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 放課後はケンカ最強のギャルに連れこまれる生活　彼女たちに好かれて、僕も最強に⁉

altTitles.ja-ro: Houkago wa Kenka Saikyou no Gyaru ni Tsurekomareru Seikatsu Kanojo-tachi ni Sukarete, Boku mo Saikyou ni!?

description.en:
As a result of a combination of his good-natured personality and bad luck, Shiki Orifushi ends up enrolling in St. Lukeman's Academy, a school renowned for its delinquent students.

Before entering the school, Shiki had lived a life far removed from being a delinquent, but at St. Lukeman's, he was an herbivore thrown into a predator's cage.
Shiki was well aware of his situation, but his sense of justice and good-natured personality make him catch the attention of one of the school's numerous gangs of delinquents.

For the next year, Shiki was bullied by the delinquents and lived through hellish days, but one day, he almost bumped into the school's strongest delinquent gal, Karin Kohinata, in front of a vending machine. As a result of this, Shiki's school life changes completely.

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel Raw](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330648656085875)
description.ja:
**ジャンルに「学園」がない不具合**

お人好しな性格と不運が重なった結果、折節史季（おりふし　しき）は不良校として名高い聖ルキマンツ学園に入学するハメになってしまう。

学園に入学する以前は不良とは縁遠い生活を送っていた史季は、聖ルキマンツ学園においては肉食動物の檻に放り込まれた草食動物そのもの。
史季自身もそのことは重々に承知していたが、そこそこの正義感とそこそこ以上にお人好しな性格が災いとなり、校内に掃いて捨てるほどいる不良グループの一つに目をつけられてしまう。

それから一年もの間、史季は不良グループにいじめられ、地獄のような日々を送っていたが、ある日、学園最強のヤンキーギャル――小日向夏凛（こひなた　かりん）と自販機前でぶつかりそうになったことを契機に、史季の学園生活は一変することとなる。

altTitles.ja: 乙嫁語り

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวแห่งทางสายไหม

description.ar: تدور أحداث القصة في بلدة ريفية بالقرب من بحر قزوين في آسيا الوسطى خلال أواخر القرن التاسع عشر عند الغزو الروسي ، وتدور القصة حول امرأة شابة ، أمير ، تصل من قرية بعيدة عبر الجبال لتتزوج كارلوك ، شاب ثماني سنوات. صغارها. يتتبع المسلسل علاقتهما أثناء تطورها ، بينما يقدم قصصًا أخرى حول مختلف الشابات وحياتهن اليومية مع خطيبهن وأزواجهن على طول طريق الحرير .
description.de: Die zwanzigjährige Amira wird von ihrem Clan zu einer Familie jenseits der Berge geschickt, damit sie deren zwölfjährigen Sohn Karluk heiratet. Nach der Hochzeit fügt sich Amira schnell in ihre neue Familie ein. Während sie einige Zeit nach ihrer Hochzeit mit Karluk entfernte Verwandte seines Clans besucht, beschließt ihre eigene Familie, sie zurückzufordern, da sie mit Amira andere Pläne haben...
description.en:
Central Asia, mid-19th century: in a rural town near the Caspian Sea, a young woman named Amir arrives from a distant village across the mountains to marry Karluk, a boy eight years her junior. The story unfolds among details of everyday family and community life. However, the peaceful atmosphere is disturbed when Amir's family demands to take her back to their village.

---
- **Won the 7th Manga Taisho Award in 2014**
description.es: Ambientada en una ciudad rural cerca del mar Caspio en Asia Central a finales del siglo xix, la historia gira en torno a una joven llamada Amira, que llega de un pueblo distante a través de las montañas para casarse con Karluk, un joven ocho años menor que ella. La serie sigue su relación a medida que se desarrolla, al tiempo que presenta otras historias sobre varias mujeres jóvenes y su vida cotidiana con sus respectivos novios y esposos a lo largo de la Ruta de la Seda.
description.fi: Tarina seuraa aluksi tuoreen morsiamen, Amiran, sekä hänen uuden perheensä elämää. Myöhemmin muun muassa kuljetaan tutkimusmatkailijan seurassa ja tutustutaan uusiin seutuihin ja uusiin morsiamiin. Upea piirrosjälki, taidokas tunnelmanluonti, uskottavasti rakennettu eksoottinen miljöö sekä useat kiinnostavat henkilöhahmot tekevät Aron morsiamista vuoden mangatapauksen!
description.fr:
La vie d’Amir, 20 ans, est bouleversée le jour où elle est envoyée dans le clan voisin pour y être mariée. Elle y rencontre Karluk, son futur époux… un garçon de huit ans son cadet ! Autre village, autres mœurs… La jeune fille, chasseuse accomplie, découvre une existence différente, entre l’aïeule acariâtre, une ribambelle d’enfants et Smith, l’explorateur anglais venu étudier leurs traditions.

Mais avant même que le jeune couple ait eu le temps de se faire à sa nouvelle vie, le couperet tombe : pour conclure une alliance plus avantageuse avec un puissant voisin, le clan d’Amir décide de récupérer la jeune femme coûte que coûte…
description.id:
Karluk Eyhon dan Amira Hargal adalah pasangan suami istri dengan usia terpaut delapan tahun (Amira 20 tahun dan Karluk 12 tahun). Setelah menikah mereka tinggal bersama dengan Keluarga Karluk.
Hubungan keduanya pun berjalan dengan baik. Namun, ketenangan mereka kemudian terusik oleh kedatangan kakak serta sepupu Amira yang berniat membawanya pulang. Apa yang sebenarnya terjadi!?
description.it: Tardo XIX secolo, nelle vicinanze del Mar Caspio in Asia centrale, lungo la via della seta. La ventenne Amira viene mandata dalle montagne in cui vive ad un altro villaggio, per sposare il più giovane Karluk, appena dodicenne. Dopo gli iniziali imbarazzi per la differenza di età fra i due, il loro rapporto comincia ad essere sempre più unito e Amira inizia ad abituarsi alla vita della tribù e ad integrarsi nella comunità, ma la pace viene disturbata quando delle persone della famiglia di Amira raggiungono il villaggio per riprenderla con loro.
description.ja: 美貌の娘・アミル（20歳）が嫁いだ相手は、若干12歳の少年・カルルク。遊牧民と定住民、８歳の年の差を越えて、ふたりは結ばれるのか……？　『エマ』で19世紀末の英国を活写した森薫の最新作はシルクロードの生活文化。馬の背に乗り弓を構え、悠久の大地に生きるキャラクターたちの物語！
description.ko:
독특한 감성으로 큰 인기를 끌며 많은 사랑을 받았던 만화 <엠마>의 작가 모리카오루의 신작. 19세기 중앙아시아의 실크로드를 배경으로 한 장대한 스케일의 내용과 섬세하고 화려한 그림 그리고 한층 성숙된 탄탄한 스토리로 무장하였다. 드넓은 중앙 아시아를 배경으로 이야기가 펼쳐진다.

이제 무대는 중앙아시아 실크로드. 끝없는 대지에서 살아가는 유목 정착민의 낮과 밤이 펼쳐지는 카스피 해 인근의 지방도시. 아름다운 연상의 신부 아미루와 소년에서 어른이 되어가는 어린 신랑 카르르크는 부부가 된다. 다른 부족에서 시집온 아미루와 어린 신랑 카르르크의 평화롭고 행복한 시간도 잠시. 이 두 부부에게 다가오는 어두운 계획이 꿈틀거리기 시작한다.
description.ne:
मध्य एशिया, 19 औं शताब्दीको मध्य: 
क्यास्पियन सागर नजिकैको एक ग्रामीण सहरमा, आमिरा नामकी युवती आफू भन्दा आठ वर्ष कान्छो केटा कार्लुकसँग विवाह गर्न पहाड पारी टाढाको गाउँबाट आइपुग्छिन्।  
कथा दैनिक परिवार र सामुदायिक जीवनको विवरणहरूको बारेमा हो।
तर, आमिराको परिवारले उनलाई आफ्नो गाउँ फर्काउन माग गर्दा शान्तिपूर्ण वातावरण खलबलिएको छ।
description.pl: Dwudziestoletnia Amir zostaje wydana za młodszego o 8 lat Karluka. Dziewczyna opuszcza swoje koczownicze plemię, by zamieszkać wraz z mężem i jego rodziną w odległym mieście na Jedwabnym Szlaku. Uzdolniona w łucznictwie i jeździectwie, otwarta i bezpośrednia Amir próbuje odnaleźć swoje miejsce w nowej społeczności. Gdy między nią a Karlukiem rozkwita głębsze uczucie, w mieście pojawia się starszy brat Amir, żądając unieważnienia małżeństwa. Między dwoma rodzinami wybucha spór.
description.ru: Это истории из жизни Амиры - прекрасной лучницы и наездницы, посланной за горы, чтобы выйти замуж за Карлука - одного из поселенцев, который младше её на 8 лет. Благодаря многим своим умениям, Амира быстро находит себе место среди жителей деревни. Но всё меняется, когда люди из деревни Амиры решают забрать её назад.
description.th: ตั้งอยู่ในเมืองชนบทใกล้ทะเลแคสเปียนในเอเชียกลางในช่วงปลายศตวรรษที่ 19 ที่รัสเซียพิชิตเรื่องราวหมุนรอบหญิงสาวคนหนึ่งชื่ออาเมียร์ที่มาจากหมู่บ้านห่างไกลข้ามภูเขาเพื่อแต่งงานกับคาร์ลุก ชายหนุ่มอายุแปดขวบ จูเนียร์ของเธอ ชุดนี้ความสัมพันธ์ของพวกเขาในขณะที่มันพัฒนาในขณะที่การนำตุ๊กตุ่นอื่น ๆ เกี่ยวกับหญิงสาวที่ต่างๆและชีวิตประจำวันของพวกเขากับคู่หมั้นของตนและสามีไปตามเส้นทางสายไหม
description.uk: Події цієї романтично-пригодницької історії розгортаються у Середній Азії позаминулого століття. Молода дівчина Аміра із суворого кочового клану прибуває до селища, щоб вийти заміж за Карлука. Це незвичайний шлюб – адже наречений молодший за неї на вісім років. Однак найбільше бажання Аміри – стати йому гарною дружиною. Вона усіма силами старається догодити і йому, і своїй новій родині, дивуючи давно осілих землеробів своїми талантами.
description.vi:
Vào thế kỉ 19, ở khu vực Trung Á, tại một vùng thị tứ gần biển Caspi…

Có một cô dâu đã vượt qua bao núi đồi để đến bên một “chú rể nhỏ”.
Cô hoang dã, đáng yêu, chân thành, đáng quý.
Vút qua thảo nguyên xanh ngời, cô bên “chàng” cưỡi ngựa du ca.
Giương cung hướng lên trời, cô đem về biết bao ngạc nhiên, kì lạ.

Đây là câu chuyện về một phương trời xa xôi huyền bí.
Câu chuyện trên Con đường Tơ lụa lắm diệu kì.
Nơi cuộc sống diễn ra trong bao la, hào sảng.
Trong những hành trình, trong tình người và trong những lời ca.

Cùng với đó, không thể không nhắc đến nét vẽ tài hoa, tỉ mỉ đến tuyệt vời của tác giả, sẽ khắc họa những nét văn hóa quyến rũ đến lạ kì của một vùng Trung Á bát ngát, bao la.
description.zh-hk: 故事設定在19世紀後半，中亞與裏海週邊的草原地帶。以12岁的少年哈剌鲁和比他大8岁的新娘爱米尔为起頭，描写在丝绸之路的游牧民族和定居民族的生活。 由數個新娘的故事組成，新娘年齡不一，來自不同的地方。有各個角色的互動凸顯出當地的民俗風情。

description.en:
This story happens in a cultivation world, Gu Qing He arrived in "Ark" during a time of crisis. "Ark" wanted to bestow incredible powers to Gu Qing He and thus started to modify him. After that, Qing He found out that his original world has actually already been infiltrated by the [Old Gods], overturning all the cognition he possesses since young.

With a danger that can arrive anytime. The Forged Immortal begins his journey, going against the ruling of the [Old Gods], changing the ending of the world.

title.en: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不器用でエロい隣人さゆりさん

altTitles.es-la: Mi torpe y erótica vecina Sayuri-san

description.en: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.
description.ja: 高校生の主人公が、隣人の主婦である「さゆりさん」と様々なエロティックなシチュエーションを繰り広げるというストーリー。

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: ヴィナス戦記
金星战记

description.en:
May 2003. An icy planet from distant space crashes into Venus, changing its qualities completely. These qualities prove to present some habitability for humans, enticing men to eventually colonize it for themselves...

80 years later, Venus is home to many people who call it home. However, an ever-present tension between the two major continents, Aphrodia and Ishtar, points to an ominous fate for Venus.

Hiroki Senoo is a rather rebellious member of a motorsport popular within Aphrodia's capital. One day, members of Aphrodia's military approach Hiroki, and, impressed by his skills, invite him to join. Thus, Hiroki finds himself enveloped in Venus's political landscape...

title.en: Urekko Mangaka X Utsu Yamai Mangaka

altTitles.vi: Họa sĩ truyện tranh bán chạy x Họa sĩ truyện tranh trầm cảm

altTitles.ja: 売れっ子漫画家×うつ病漫画家

altTitles.en: The Popular Mangaka and The Depressed Mangaka
The Best-seller Mangaka and The Depressed Mangaka

description.en:
A story about the twisted entanglement between a depressed, shut-in, have-been mangaka, and another best-seller, Super Darling mangaka.
This is an independent manga done by Eno Sumi (After God) under the alias of Hanae Deki (英恵 溺).

altTitles.ja: 淫獄団地

description.en:
This apartment complex has a problem with perverted women!

Yoshida is a tiny, frail highschool graduate who became an unwilling manager of an apartment complex when his father, the former manager, injured himself. Unbeknownst to him, this apartment complex houses quite a few women with very... unusual sexual preferences. This becomes a problem when a mysterious entity begins giving "Libido Cloth" to these women - skimpy outfits that give them superpowers and cause them to go on lewd rampages! Will Yoshida be able to stop them?

title.en: Boku to Koi no Hanashi wo Shinaika

altTitles.en: Won't You Talk About Love With Me?

altTitles.ja: 僕と恋の話をしないか

description.en:
"Yana" is an infamous playboy who dumps people left and right. But his true identity is one with a pure heart pining for "Metsuki", the area's worst delinquent. He saved Yana at the entrance ceremony and the latter fell for him immediately! Yana never stops yapping about his love day in and day out for Metsuki, who's tired of all this crap. So he asked Yana if he could kiss him like they do in shoujo manga. And...?!

Emeichi's newest, love story between two clumsy high school boys starts here!!!

altTitles.ja: 野球場でいただきます

description.en:
Tsubame Sakamoto, 25 years old and single. She relieves the everyday stress by indulging in food and alcohol in front of baseball games. Trying out different dishes at different stadiums, with adults loudly cheering around her. It might be expensive, but nothing tastes better than beer after a win. Free from the pressure of society, she will enjoy the best baseball stadium food!

---
- [VOMIC](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIWyAhaN76PJDQu88ci4eI7j)
description.ja: 坂本つばめ、25歳独身。彼女の日々の社会へのストレス発散方法は、野球を肴に飯と酒を貪ること！ 球場によって違う多様なご飯。周りには羽目を外した大人たち。値段は高いけど、勝てば何よりも美味いビール。社会の重圧から解放された非日常で食べる、最高の球場飯をご賞味あれ！
description.ko:
사카모토 츠바메, 25세 독신.
그녀가 평소 사회에서 쌓인 스트레스를 푸는 방법은 야구장에서 돈도 칼로리도 신경 쓰지 않고 마음껏 밥과 술을 먹는 것!!
구장에서 만난 야구관전 초보 카메이와 함께 관동지방 구장의 맛있는 음식들을 맛보고 다닌다.
두 여자의 구장 먹방 라이브, 꼭 맛보세요☆

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.ja-ro: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

description.en: Sitting in a corner of the city is a seemingly normal shop called 'Time Photo Studio'. The shop owners, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, can dive back in time through photos. One day, an uprising star in the Chinese opera world — Lin Kai — visited the studio and tasked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a cassette tape from 10 years ago. They only have one photo, and one chance...
description.fr: Dans un coin de la ville se trouve une boutique, en apparence normale, nommée le "Time Photo Studio". Les propriétaires de la boutique, Cheng Xiaoshi et Lu Guang, peuvent voyager dans le temps au travers de photos. Un jour, une étoile montante de l'opéra chinois, Lin Kai, visite leur studio et leur demande de trouver un enregistrement datant d'il y a 10 ans. Ils n'ont qu'une seule photo et qu'une chance...
description.zh: 在城市的某个角落，有一家看似普通的小店——时光照相馆。店主程小时和陆光可以通过照片，进入过去的时空。有一天，戏曲界新锐林凯来到了照相馆，委托程小时与陆光，寻找一份10年前的影像。照片只有1张，机会只有1次……
